Script.Query: CREATE TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ( `flowFamilyID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL, `sendStatusChangedUserSMS` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendExternalMessageReceivedUserSMS` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceSubmittedUserSMS` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceArchivedUserSMS` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendStatusChangedUserEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendExternalMessageReceivedUserEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceSubmittedUserEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceArchivedUserEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255), `flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailMessage` TEXT, `flowInstanceArchivedUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255), `flowInstanceArchivedUserEmailMessage` TEXT, `sendExternalMessageReceivedManagerEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceAssignedManagerEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendStatusChangedManagerEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `sendFlowInstanceSubmittedManagerEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL, `flowInstanceSubmittedManagerEmailAddress` VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (`flowFamilyID`) ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachPDF` BOOLEAN NOT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAddress`;

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachPDF`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailMessage` TEXT AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailSubject`;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceArchivedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage` TEXT AFTER `flowInstanceArchivedUserEmailMessage`;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage` TEXT AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailMessage`;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailAttachPDF` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage`;

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachPDFAttachmentsSeparately` TINYINT(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachPDF`;
UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailMessage = replace(flowInstanceSubmittedUserEmailMessage, "a src=", "a href=");
UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET flowInstanceSubmittedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage = replace(flowInstanceSubmittedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage, "a src=", "a href=");
UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET flowInstanceArchivedUserEmailMessage = replace(flowInstanceArchivedUserEmailMessage, "a src=", "a href=");
UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET flowInstanceArchivedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage = replace(flowInstanceArchivedNotLoggedInUserEmailMessage, "a src=", "a href=");
UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailMessage = replace(flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailMessage, "a src=", "a href=");

CREATE TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_setting_submitglobal` ( `flowFamilyID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `email` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flowFamilyID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_flow_familiy_notification_setting_submitglobal_1` FOREIGN KEY `FK_flow_familiy_notification_setting_submitglobal_1` (`flowFamilyID`) REFERENCES `flow_familiy_notification_settings` (`flowFamilyID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE = InnoDB;

INSERT INTO flow_familiy_notification_setting_submitglobal (SELECT flowFamilyID, flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAddress FROM flow_familiy_notification_settings WHERE flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAddress IS NOT NULL);
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` DROP COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAddress`;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_setting_submitglobal` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY USING BTREE(`flowFamilyID`, `email`);
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `sendExternalMessageReceivedGlobalEmail` BOOLEAN NOT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailMessage`;

CREATE TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_setting_extmessageglobal` ( `flowFamilyID` INTEGER UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `email` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flowFamilyID`), CONSTRAINT `FK_flow_familiy_notification_setting_extmessageglobal_1` FOREIGN KEY `FK_flow_familiy_notification_setting_extmessageglobal_1` (`flowFamilyID`) REFERENCES `flow_familiy_notification_settings` (`flowFamilyID`) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_setting_extmessageglobal` DROP PRIMARY KEY, ADD PRIMARY KEY USING BTREE(`flowFamilyID`, `email`);

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `statusChangedUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `sendStatusChangedUserEmail`, ADD COLUMN `statusChangedUserEmailMessage` TEXT AFTER `statusChangedUserEmailSubject`, ADD COLUMN `externalMessageReceivedUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `sendExternalMessageReceivedUserEmail`, ADD COLUMN `externalMessageReceivedUserEmailMessage` TEXT AFTER `externalMessageReceivedUserEmailSubject`, ADD COLUMN `externalMessageReceivedManagerSubject` VARCHAR(255) AFTER `sendExternalMessageReceivedManagerEmail`, ADD COLUMN `externalMessageReceivedManagerMessage` TEXT AFTER `externalMessageReceivedManagerSubject`;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachXML` BOOLEAN NOT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceSubmittedGlobalEmailAttachPDF`;

CREATE TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_setting_managerexpiredglobal` ( `flowFamilyID` INT(10) UNSIGNED NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `email` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`flowFamilyID`, `email`), CONSTRAINT `FK_flow_familiy_notification_setting_managerexpiredglobal_1` FOREIGN KEY (`flowFamilyID`) REFERENCES `flow_familiy_notification_settings` (`flowFamilyID`) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE ) COLLATE='latin1_swedish_ci' ENGINE=InnoDB;
ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `sendManagerExpiredGlobalEmail` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL AFTER `sendExternalMessageReceivedGlobalEmail`;

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` MODIFY COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedUserSMS` VARCHAR(1024) CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci DEFAULT NULL, MODIFY COLUMN `flowInstanceSubmittedNotLoggedInUserSMS` VARCHAR(1024) CHARACTER SET latin1 COLLATE latin1_swedish_ci DEFAULT NULL;

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserSMS` VARCHAR(1024) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `sendManagerExpiredGlobalEmail`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserSMS`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserEmailMessage` TEXT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserEmailSubject`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserSMS` VARCHAR(1024) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignInitiatedUserEmailMessage`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserSMS`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserEmailMessage` TEXT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserEmailSubject`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledOwnerSMS` VARCHAR(1024) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledUserEmailMessage`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledOwnerEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledOwnerSMS`, ADD COLUMN `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledOwnerEmailMessage` TEXT NULL AFTER `flowInstanceMultiSignCanceledOwnerEmailSubject`;

ALTER TABLE `flow_familiy_notification_settings` ADD COLUMN `sendStatusChangedManagerGroupEmail` TINYINT(1) NOT NULL AFTER `internalMessageAddedGroupEmailMessage`, ADD COLUMN `statusChangedManagerGroupEmailSubject` VARCHAR(255) NULL DEFAULT NULL AFTER `sendStatusChangedManagerGroupEmail`, ADD COLUMN `statusChangedManagerGroupEmailMessage` TEXT NULL AFTER `statusChangedManagerGroupEmailSubject`;

Query.precondition: SELECT readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedManagerEmailMessage FROM flow_familiy_notification_settings WHERE readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedManagerEmailMessage LIKE '%Ett fil har laddats ner kopplat till%';

Script.Query: UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedManagerEmailMessage = REPLACE(readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedManagerEmailMessage, 'Ett fil har laddats ner kopplat till ärendet $flow.name', 'En fil har laddats ner kopplat till ärendet $flow.name');

Query.precondition: SELECT readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedGroupEmailMessage FROM flow_familiy_notification_settings WHERE readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedGroupEmailMessage LIKE '%Ett fil har laddats ner kopplat till%';

Script.Query: UPDATE flow_familiy_notification_settings SET readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedGlobalEmailMessage = REPLACE(readReceiptAttachmentDownloadedGlobalEmailMessage, 'Ett fil har laddats ner kopplat till ärendet $flow.name', 'En fil har laddats ner kopplat till ärendet $flow.name');
